title: Bonus 10: Gnosticism: Gnowing me, Gnowing You
itunes:title: Bonus: Gnosticism- Gnowing me, Gnowing You
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I introduce the rich apocalyptic literature that flourished after the canon of the Old testament closed. We get into Gnosticism, evil, and dualism.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I introduce the rich apocalyptic literature that flourished after the canon of the Old testament closed. We get into Gnosticism, evil, and dualism.
itunes:subtitle: The Apocalypse is here!
